headline.main: Company in CityTime Payroll Scandal to Pay $500 Million

docs.snippet: Science Applications International Corporation agreed to pay $370 million in restitution and $130 million in a penalty for its role in what prosecutors called one of the "most brazen frauds ever committed against the City of New York."...
